content.rendered:
[vc_row][vc_column][vc_empty_space height=”50px”][vc_column_text]Education Marketing Services for Institutes is more competitive than ever before, which means your marketing needs to be as effective as possible. Digital marketing for the education sector is becoming a promising avenue due to the boom of web and digital media in the education sector. Education companies need to transform their offering by keeping digital platforms as the central axis of communication while reaching out to prospective students or parents.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_empty_space height=”50px”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” css=”.vc_custom_1614751116692{padding-top: 20px !important;background-color: __USE_THEME_MAIN_COLOR__ !important;}”][vc_column][vc_custom_heading text=”Our results speak for us!” font_container=”tag:h2|text_align:center|color:%23ffffff” use_theme_fonts=”yes”][vc_separator color=”white” border_width=”2″ el_width=”10″][vc_empty_space height=”30px”][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″]

[/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_empty_space height=”50px”][vc_custom_heading text=”Our Services” font_container=”tag:h2|text_align:center” use_theme_fonts=”yes”][vc_separator color=”black” border_width=”2″ el_width=”10″][vc_empty_space height=”50px”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width=”1/3″ el_class=”edu-institute” css=”.vc_custom_1614687109207{padding-top: 20px !important;}”]

Website Design for Educational Institutions

To be available on an online platform having a good user-friendly website is the initial step. As an education marketing agency, we provide 360-degree solutions for your institutes. We provide responsive & informative websites to make an impact on people who want to know about your institution through the web.
[vc_btn title=”Read More” shape=”round” size=”sm” align=”center” link=”url:https%3A%2F%2Fwww.digitalconsultingpandit.com%2Fweb-designing-services%2F|title:Web%20Designing||”][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/3″ el_class=”edu-institute” css=”.vc_custom_1614687114124{padding-top: 20px !important;}”]

PPC Campaign / Search Engine Marketing

In the highly competitive higher education sector, top colleges and universities are seeing the value of using Pay-Per-Click services to connect with prospective students. In PPC/search engine marketing service, we create ad campaigns strategically targeting keywords, location, placement and audience types.
[vc_btn title=”Read More” shape=”round” size=”sm” align=”center” link=”url:https%3A%2F%2Fwww.digitalconsultingpandit.com%2Fadwords-services%2F|title:Adwords||”][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/3″ el_class=”edu-institute” css=”.vc_custom_1614687119896{padding-top: 20px !important;}”]

Search Engine Optimization (SEO)

Search Engine Optimization (SEO) plays a crucial role in training or teaching business, even on a small scale. Search Engine Optimization is the way towards improving web content in a way that increases page rankings in search results. Search engines are the first place where individuals investigate data and settle on educated choices.
[vc_btn title=”Read More” shape=”round” size=”sm” align=”center” link=”url:https%3A%2F%2Fwww.digitalconsultingpandit.com%2Fseo-services%2F|title:SEO||”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_empty_space height=”50px”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width=”1/3″ el_class=”edu-institute” css=”.vc_custom_1614687125202{padding-top: 20px !important;}”]

Social Media Marketing

Our experts provide an exclusive social media strategy, execution & implementation with long-term results. We were successful in marketing education brands on top social media platforms.
[vc_btn title=”Read More” shape=”round” size=”sm” align=”center” link=”url:https%3A%2F%2Fwww.digitalconsultingpandit.com%2Fsocial-media-marketing-services%2F|title:Social%20Media%20Marketing||”][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/3″ el_class=”edu-institute” css=”.vc_custom_1614687130380{padding-top: 20px !important;}”]

Google Analytics

Our analytics experts offer marketing channel analytics, conversion optimization, and building intuitive dashboards that provide a single view of your marketing data.
[vc_btn title=”Read More” shape=”round” size=”sm” align=”center” link=”url:https%3A%2F%2Fwww.digitalconsultingpandit.com%2Fgoogle-analytics-services%2F|title:Google%20Analytics||”][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/3″ el_class=”edu-institute” css=”.vc_custom_1614687136243{padding-top: 20px !important;}”]

Digital Marketing Consultancy

We provide exclusive industry-specific Online Marketing strategy & execution plan from our top Digital Marketing Consultants & help to grow your business.
[vc_btn title=”Read More” shape=”round” size=”sm” align=”center” link=”url:https%3A%2F%2Fwww.digitalconsultingpandit.com%2Fdigital-marketing-consultancy%2F|title:Digital%20Marketing%20Consultancy||”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_empty_space height=”50px”][vc_separator][vc_empty_space height=”50px”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_custom_heading text=”Our Clients” font_container=”tag:h2|text_align:center” use_theme_fonts=”yes”][vc_separator color=”black” border_width=”2″ el_width=”10″]
